attributes.action: captain Tom moore to receive an honour
attributes.additional_details: This guy is 99 years of age and to date he has raised over 4 million pounds for the NHS single handedly. This guy is a world war 2 veteran and deserves the up most respect and should receive an honour for his efforts
attributes.background: Captain Tom moore should receive an honour for his fund raising effort for the national health service

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
